docs.title: Dev Env
docs.text:
1. This repo has pre-commit configured. Please run pre-commit install before committing code.
  2. ts_diffusion uses poetry to manage python env.
  3. Install poetry.
  4. Specify python version, e.g. poetry env use 3.10.8.
  5. Install dependencies: poetry install
  6. If you really hate poetry, please use the requirements.txt. This file is automatically updated by poetry though the poetry-export hook. Any manual changes to this requirements.txt file will be overwritten by pre-commit.
  7. All contents in the datasets folder is excluded from git.

docs.title: Datasets
docs.text: We can download datasets and load them through ts-bolt.

docs.title: References
docs.text: In this section, we provide the references for the ts_diffusion codebase.
